name: LD52 - Harvesting The Dark Souls
description:
Harvest the Dark Souls of the innocent in this wave based fighting game. Level up and choose an item after every wave, but be careful all the items have a drawback. WASD to move.
Try to beat round 30 and post your high score in the comments.
Made Using Unity, Visual Studio, Aseprite. Mady by Muglisch Studios
